short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension designed to be an AI Task List

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will be an AI chrome extension task list. It does not leverage any invasive permissions such as storage or active tab. This chrome extension when opened will allow you to create tasks! So you can open the extension and add or delete personal tasks whenever you want. There will then be additional AI features loaded on top like task reminders or auto complete! Users should install this chrome extension if they'd like an additional productivity boost in managing their daily tasks.
